entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
